TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PartnerException extends System.Exception

Docs.summary: The standard exception thrown by the partner SDK. This pertains to errors accessing the partner service. Other standard exceptions such as null argument exceptions will also be thrown in case of malformed input.
